TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapUnknownHeader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader
Public NotInheritable Class SoapUnknownHeader Inherits SoapHeader

summary.span: Represents the data received from a SOAP header that was not understood by the recipient XML Web service or XML Web service client.

span.span: Represents the data received from a SOAP header that was not understood by the recipient XML Web service or XML Web service client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 客户端可能会调用 XML Web 服务使用 SOAP 标头的窗体中所需的参数之外的其他数据。A SOAP client might invoke an XML Web service with additional data beyond the required parameters in the form of a SOAP header. 使用 ASP.NET 或 XML Web 服务客户端创建的 XML Web 服务可以查看其不了解 XML Web 服务通过将应用编写时任何 SOAP 标头与属性的数组， ，或数组给 XML Web 服务方法。An XML Web service created using ASP.NET or an XML Web service client can view any SOAP headers it did not know about at the time the XML Web service was written by applying a with a property of either an array of , , or an array of to the XML Web service method. 指定的，允许 XML Web 服务的形式查看的 SOAP 标头内容。Specifying a of , allows the XML Web service to view the contents of the SOAP header in the form of an . ## Examples `MyWebService` XML Web 服务接受并处理`MyHeader`到任何调用一起发送的 SOAP 标头`MyWebMethod`XML Web 服务方法。The `MyWebService` XML Web service accepts and processes the `MyHeader` SOAP header sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method. 此外，`MyWebMethod`而不接收任何 SOAP 标头`MyHeader`SOAP 标头。Additionally, `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

member this.Element : System.Xml.XmlElement with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the XML Header element for a SOAP request or response.

span.span: Gets or sets the XML Header element for a SOAP request or response.

value.span: 表示 SOAP 标头的原始 XML。

span.span: An representing the raw XML of the SOAP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 XML Web 服务方法需要处理 SOAP 标头，它不知道编写 XML Web 服务时，它可以处理表示 SOAP 标头的原始 XML 的类。If an XML Web service method wants to process SOAP headers it does not know about at the time the XML Web service is written, it can process an class representing the raw XML of the SOAP header. ## Examples 以下`MyWebService`XML Web 服务接收所有 SOAP 标头，而不包括`MyHeader`它了解 SOAP 标头。The following `MyWebService` XML Web service receives all SOAP headers, including ones other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header it knows about. `MyWebMethod` XML Web 服务方法返回到客户端的最后一个未知 SOAP 标头作为字符串传递给它的 XML 特性。The `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method returns to the client the XML attributes of the last unknown SOAP header passed to it as a string. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapUnknownHeader.Element Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]
